DOC.brief_summary: This study is planned to compare right internal jugular vein catheterization entry points determined by ultrasound and the central landmark guided method, and the relationship of each with sternocleidomastoid muscle length and body mass index.
DOC.brief_title: Central Landmark vs USG for IJV Catheterization
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing cardiovascular surgery who needed to have internal jugular vein catheterization aged 18y or older previous neck surgery, burns, limited neck movement, diffuse goiter or bleeding problems
